  Manages SSH host key on RTX routers. This is a singleton resource - only one instance should exist per router. The host key is used for SSH server authentication. If no host key exists, creating this resource will generate one.

# rtx_sshd_host_key (Resource)

Manages SSH host key on RTX routers. This is a singleton resource - only one instance should exist per router. The host key is used for SSH server authentication. If no host key exists, creating this resource will generate one.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `algorithm` (String) Host key algorithm (e.g., ssh-rsa).
- `fingerprint` (String) SSH host key fingerprint.
- `id` (String) Identifier for this singleton resource.
